__e: Thank you all for coming. I know you're all busy, so this won't take long.
I'm happy to be here, but I'm sick about the reason.
But I, uh... I'm... happy to be here and to see people taking control of their own lives... you know?
Why do you believe then that you were with him?
I believe I made myself clear when last we spoke.
- You know, I would love to help, but I think I've made it pretty clear,
Ah, I can't believe I'm in this mess with Liz.
Do not give pain, so guilty of being ... and I know that I must pay.
Though at first I believed I would be able to keep you for myself, now I can't do so any longer.
Thanks for coming, I wanted to ask you sorry for my mother last night.
You know, they say that you never turn off being a cop, but, uh, I sure did.
"You think you're a regular fellow ...why, you're nothing but the college boob !"
If I could, I'd say to David that living those days with him... reminded me of what life is like, instead of being a relief from it.
